name: Groomer run 3D
description:
Race and stack up all the beautifying items and bonuses you can pick up along the way.
Run through the obstacles and bring your adventurous pet to a fabulous stylish ride!

Key game features:
- Cuteness at your fingertip
- Addictive gameplay
- Bright 3D graphics

Download Groomer Run 3D and makeover your animal today with a variety of dresses, and multiple accessories. Your pet has never been so glamorous!
